property_history.notes: Grandmother purchased vacant block intending to build retirement home. Never built due to health issues.
Grandmother passed away. Land was still vacant

property_history.description: Beneficiary built family home on inherited land
property_history.notes: Decided to build and live in property
Beneficiary moved in - now main residence

properties.notes: sold - Inherited vacant land, beneficiary built home and lived in it. Complex CGT: Land inherited (cost base = MV at death), building added to cost base. Partial MRE from move-in date only.

user_query: I inherited vacant land from my grandmother in 2020. She'd owned it since 2005 but never built on it. I built a house and moved in during 2022, and I've now sold. How is CGT calculated when I've added a building to inherited land and then lived in it?
